en: Addendum No 4 to Project Agreement between Switzerland represented by the State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (seco) and the Republic of Poland represented by the Ministry of Regional Development as the National Coordination Unit (NCU) concerning the grant for the Project KIK-23 "Procurement of four diesel units to operate the railway section Malbork-Grudziadz, in order to improve the safety, management, efficiency and reliability of the local transport system" - 27-02-2015 - Project Agreement between Switzerland represented by the State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (seco) and the Republic of Poland represented by the Ministry of Regional Development as the National Coordination Unit (NCU) concerning the grant for the Project KIK-23 "Procurement of four diesel units to operate the railway section Malbork-Grudziadz, in order to improve the safety, management, efficiency and reliability of the local transport system" to be implemented during the period 1 May 2012 - 31 July 2014
